item.title: De Grote Peiling 13-12-2019 - confidence intervals
item.description: import {Runtime, Inspector} from "https://unpkg.com/@observablehq/notebook-runtime?module"; import notebook from "https:\/\/api.observablehq.com\/@twielfaert\/vlaamse-kiesintenties.js?v=3"; Runtime.load(notebook, Inspector.into(document.getElementById('obs-notebook'))); #obs-notebook { font-size: 0.8em; background: #fdfdfd; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 9px; }
